name: Performance.measure
description: The measure() method creates a named timestamp in the browser's performance entry buffer between marks, the navigation start time, or the current time. When measuring between two marks, there is a start mark and end mark, respectively. The named timestamp is referred to as a measure.

refs.name: User Timing Level 2
refs.description: The definition of 'measure()' in the 'User Timing Level 2' specification.

refs.name: User Timing
refs.description: The definition of 'measure()' in the 'User Timing' specification.
